archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.1.4c: c) restricting access to business applications, systems and networks by audit teams (e.g. by granting read only access to information and software files or granting increased levels of access only for isolated copies of information and software files)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
